sentences.en: Circus monkeys are trained to be very docile and obedient.
sentences.cn: 马戏团的猴子训练得服服贴贴的.

sentences.en: citizens who are obedient to the law
Every citizen should be obedient to the law.
sentences.cn: 每个公民都应当是遵守法律的.

sentences.en: Hai - erh is very intelligent . He's obedient too . We all like him.
sentences.cn: 海儿很聪明,又肯听大人的话,我们都喜欢他.

sentences.en: He enjoined his son to be obedient.
sentences.cn: 他嘱咐儿子要听话[顺从].

sentences.en: He enjoined that his son ( should ) be obedient.
sentences.cn: 他叮嘱儿子要听话[顺从].

sentences.en: He was very respectful at home and obedient to his parents.
sentences.cn: 他在家里对父母十分恭敬顺从。

sentences.en: Obedient to his order Suke had gone to bed.
sentences.cn: 遵照他的命令,苏柯已经上床睡了.

sentences.en: The officer was militarily severe, the soldier obedient.
sentences.cn: 这个军官是军纪森严, 这个士兵则唯命是从.

sentences.en: The one-eyed man obeyed the obedient audience's order.
sentences.cn: 独眼人服从了顺从的听众的命令。

sentences.en: The reign of Kertarajasa was peaceful and the whole land obedient.
sentences.cn: 格尔达拉查沙的统治是太平的,全国是忠顺的.

sentences.en: Their early training programmes them to be obedient and submissive.
sentences.cn: 他们早期受过的教育把他们训练得俯首帖耳、唯命是从.

sentences.en: We sat down, obedient to the wishes of Oliver.
sentences.cn: 我们顺从奥利弗的意愿,坐了下来.

sentences.en: We're absolutely obedient to the superior.
What a sweet, obedient little girl she was in the sixth grade.
sentences.cn: 她上六年级的时候是个多么可爱温顺的小女孩啊！

phrases.tran_cn: (旧)您恭顺的仆人（用于信尾的套语）

trans.tran_cn: 顺从的，服从的，忠顺的，孝顺的，驯良的
trans.tran_en: always doing what you are told to do, or what the law, a rule etc says you must do
